policy.name: Policy for service #51937293, Content-Type Branching
policy.xml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy"> <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required"> <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required"> <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required"> <L7p:ComparisonAssertion> <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/> <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${request.http.header.content-type}"/> <L7p:Operator operatorNull="null"/> <L7p:Predicates predicates="included"> <L7p:item dataType="included"> <L7p:Type type="string"/> </L7p:item> <L7p:item binary="included"> <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/> <L7p:RightValue stringValue="text/xml"/> </L7p:item> </L7p:Predicates> </L7p:ComparisonAssertion> <L7p:HardcodedResponse> <L7p:Base64ResponseBody stringValue="PHRlbXBsYXRlUmVzcG9uc2U+Y29udGVudC10eXBlIHdhcyB0ZXh0L3htbDwvdGVtcGxhdGVSZXNwb25zZT4="/> </L7p:HardcodedResponse> </wsp:All> <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required"> <L7p:HardcodedResponse> <L7p:Base64ResponseBody stringValue="PHRlbXBsYXRlUmVzcG9uc2U+Y29udGVudC10eXBlIHdhcyBub3QgdGV4dC94bWw8L3RlbXBsYXRlUmVzcG9uc2U+"/> </L7p:HardcodedResponse> </wsp:All> </wsp:OneOrMore> </wsp:All> </wsp:Policy>
